name: DARWINBOX DIGITAL SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
description: Developer of software as a service-based human resource management platform designed to transform the interaction between the workforce and technology. The company's platform offers an easy-to-use interface, functional depth, faster implementation cycles and new-age features including e-onboarding, merit planning, continuous feedback, performance journals and insightful analytics, enabling mid to large-sized enterprises to manage core operations and drive employee engagement and performance.
one_liner: Developer of software as a service-based human resource management platform designed to transform the interaction between the workforce and technology. The company's platform offers an easy-to-use interface, functional depth, faster implementation cycles and new-age features including e-onboarding, merit planning, continuous feedback, performance journals and insightful analytics, enabling mid to large-sized enterprises to manage core operations and drive employee engagement and performance.
